snippet: The Pennsylvania Supreme Court sided with a state judge who said that prosecutors withheld evidence in the 1986 murder trial of Terrance Williams.
abstract: Pennsylvania Supreme Court halts the execution of convicted murderer Terrance Williams on the ground that prosecutors withheld evidence his 1986 trial that could have led to a lesser penalty.
lead_paragraph: The Pennsylvania Supreme Court sided with a state judge who said that prosecutors withheld evidence in the 1986 murder trial of Terrance Williams.

headline.main: Pennsylvania Justices Back Stay of Murderer’s Execution
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania Justices Back Stay of Murderer’s Execution
